comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
I don't recall if I already gave the instructions, but here they are again. :-)

To publish static files to our website, just commit them to the jackrabbit/site folder in svn, from where they will automatically be deployed to the public web site. See http://jackrabbit.apache.org/website.html for the details.

comments.author: Christophe Lombart
comments.body:
Thanks Jukka for the info. 

The OCM 1.5 has beed added into the website. It will available from http://jackrabbit.apache.org/dtd/
This may take some time before seeing it on the site.

description: The jackrabbit-ocm DTD 1.5 is missing and it should be made available for reference on the Jackrabbit web site.
summary: The jackrabbit-ocm DTD 1.5 is missing and has to be publish
